entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Gananoque
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:06 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Grenadier Island 10:00 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
Temperature: 3.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 87 %
Dewpoint: 1.7°C
Wind: SSW 21 km/h gust 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain showers or flurries. Temperature rising to plus 4 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with ice pellets changing to rain showers this evening then to a few flurries after midnight. Risk of freezing rain early this evening. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 60 late this evening. Temperature rising to plus 4 this evening then falling. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. High plus 3.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then cloudy. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 3. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
